${ModID}:MutagenBlood.NAME: Mutagen Blood
${ModID}:MutagenBlood.FLAVOR: Woops. I forgot to tell you about side effects. -The Augmenter
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce HP loss from #yJ.A.X. to #b1. At the end of combat, lose #b6 HP if you didn't play #yJ.A.X.

${ModID}:Binder.NAME: Three Ring Binder
${ModID}:Binder.FLAVOR: The perfect tool for keeping everything exactly as it should be.
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, #yUpgrade #b2 random cards. If your deck has more than #b25 cards, the Merchant's card removal service always costs #b25 #yGold.
